project.name: Neddy
project.description:
An event driven HTTP/1.1 Web Server based on the Netty framework. Features are:
* Static content handler. * Push messages handler based on WebSockets. * Rest interface to receive messages/categories to the pushed.
It also includes some benchmarking tools to test its behaviour:
* Neddy Static Content benchmark, to test static content handling. * Neddy REST benchmark, to test Neddy's REST interface. * Neddy Websocket benchmark, to test Neddy's Websocket client interface.
